data.message:
Have been a fan of yours for at least 2 decades or more, supported you from the start and bought every one of your albums and cds... Do yourself a favour and stay out of politics.

Rapping is your strong point, using your brain for intelligent debate and politics isn't.

replies.message: He's a human. He's got opinions about everything and that includes Trump. If you don't like it, that's your own stupidity.
If u been a fan that long you would know he has always been into politcs, remember fuck bush and cheney and making fun of bill?

Israel Razo Pinete Maybe because they actually deserved it. I don't know a single person that actually liked them, no matter the political party. Where was he when Obama was president? Trading 5 high ranking ISIS members for a traitor is a fuck of a lot worse then Trump's admittedly childish behavior or Twitter no matter which way you cut it.
